name: Valamar Lacroma Dubrovnik

reviews.text: Have just returned from a 3 night break to this hotel and would definitely recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Really lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was spacious, bathroom well equipped and spotlessly clean, beds very comfortable, aircon worked well, public areas also very clean and well maintained, staff helpful and friendly, cocktails in the bar excellent...I could go on and on.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were staying on a bed and breakfast basis, but were so impressed with the quality of the food that we actually ended up eating in both the buffet and fine dining restaurants in the evenings.
reviews.title: Wonderful time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was probably the biggest selection I have ever seen...truly something for everyone and all of the hot food cooked in front of you. Omelettes were especially good!
reviews.title: Truly memorable

reviews.text: Resort wasn't too busy when we were there, although I'd suspect in the summer months it would be a very popular area as there's plenty nearby for all tastes...pool, spa, kids play areas, tennis, shops, bars, restaurants etc. Definitely recommend this hotel and Dubrovnik itself.
reviews.title: Deserved every star...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was one of the top hotels we stayed at during our recent Croatia/Slovenia tour with Gate 1.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel choice by Gate 1

reviews.text: The only flaws would be that: 1. with a bus tour, we didn't get rooms overlooking the pool and the water - the sunsets were amazing from the terrace and pool areas and would have been great to enjoy those from our own balcony; and 2. dinner in the hotel restaurant was priced way too high!
reviews.title: Wish I could have stayed longer

reviews.text: There were complaints amongst our group regarding the quality of the pub food. We found the selection limited but the quality adequate.
reviews.title: The Best Made Plans ....

reviews.text: But we really loved the indoor and outdoor pools! They should be open later than 9:00 p.m. - swimming under the stars is wonderful too! The outdoor pool was about 68 degrees Fahrenheit - perfect for us Canadians, and then came inside to the indoor pool, like following up in a hot tub!
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Taking the #6 bus out of Dubrovnik got us back to the hotel fine - just didn't enjoy the sardine effect on the bus! (I'm sure the locals don't enjoy it either).
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel, very friendly personnel and very good food!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in July 2012& Had a wonderful time. The pool (indoor & outdoor) are both lovely. The bar had a great selection and the food was great. The breakfast was the best thing about the hotel, everything was so fresh. The lady that cooked the Omlettes was the friendliest person every morning. You must try the omlettes. One day we were going on a very early morning excursion and the hotel gave us a packed lunch to take with us. It was a lovely touch. There is a frequent bus service outside the door and it was never too packed at this was the first/second stop on the route into town.
reviews.title: lovely hotel

reviews.text: Well worth a visit.
reviews.title: Excellent business trip

reviews.text: Tip-ask for a sea view room
reviews.title: Excelent view, wonderfull breakfast and great hospitality

reviews.text: September 5th to 10th, 2011, business trip, sorry for this late post...
reviews.title: Good modern hotel

reviews.text: I have never been to a seaside resort at this time of year to do business, frankly speaking, and, from now on, I will not accept less. This is a joke, of course, but it summarises what could be experienced there
reviews.title: Business, vacation

reviews.text: A friend and I rounded off a short break in Dubrovnik with a night here. It is very much a escort hotel and so probably good for families. Huge buffet breakfast and in the evening (although there are a few restaurant options). The swimming pools were huge and the hotel and grounds are clean and nicely laid out. To get to the beach its a little walk (5-10 mins) and then you go through one of its sister hotels, which isn't a problem but I imagine the beach is very busy at peak times.the hotel is not near the town so its hard to go out in the evening and wander along through the streets or go for a drink (although there is a minibus to the centre). Overall it's good but perhaps lacking a bit in character.
reviews.title: Good resort hotel, quite far from town centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely clean hotel, I think it's better to stay away from the old town where hygiene is questionable. Great breakfast, lovely spread. Rooms lovely and clean, room service is great. Staff exceptionally friendly.
reviews.title: No Complaints

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's a great base for Dubrovnik, the local bus service is all you need to get about.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: In general the hotel was very good. I have been there in November and as it was off season the prices were very reasonable. We had half board and both breakfast and dinner were very good. The food variety was quite high and almost everything was tasty.
reviews.title: Ideal for resting

reviews.text: The room was perfect, clean, comfortable, spacious. Just two negative things: The staff at the restaurant and the reception could not speak English and the temperature at the indoor pool was a bit low, but this did not affect our stay there.
reviews.title: Overrated

description: Welcome to Dubrovnik’s newest treasure and largest conference and spa hotel in the region. The Valamar Lacroma Dubrovnik is an astounding model of ‘archinature’ – a harmony of 21st century styling in a gorgeous natural environment. Nestled in glorious seclusion amidst the lush greenery of the Babin Kuk peninsula, the ultra-modern resort sets the standard for Croatian hospitality. Spectacular sea views and stylish interiors are just the foundations of what is truly an awe-inspiring resort.
